relation: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 11/25/2013 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
Reporting date extended to Monday, June 30, 2014, pending concurrence
Reporting date extended to Thursday, July 31, 2014, pending concurrence
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means
title: Actions for Bill H.2389
textBeforeTable: words:— and committee for public counsel services. lottery commission” and inserting after the word “commission” in line 24 the following Official Edition is hereby amended by striking the word "and" before the words “the state Section seven of chapter one hundred fifty E of the General Laws as appearing in the 2008 Section 3: for public counsel Services. and inserting after the word “commission” in line 10 the following words:— or the committee Official Edition is hereby amended by striking the word "or" before the word “commission” Section seven of chapter one hundred fifty E of the General Laws as appearing in the 2008 Section 2: Section one of chapter one hundred fifty E of the General Laws is hereby amended by adding to the end of the sixth paragraph, titled "Employer" or "public employer", the following sentence:— In the case of employees of the committee for public counsel services, employer shall mean the committee for public counsel services or its designee. Section 1:
